string.text: Weapon in slot one repair cost:
Weapon in slot two repair cost:
Armour repair cost:
Let's see your prices.
Sidorovich, I see, you do repair stuff from time to time, don't you?

Ah... you are talking about that thing in the vice? Yeah, it gonna be a good gun. And expensive. So, what do you need to be repaired? But I'm warning you: it's very expensive. The more the wear is, the more is the price. So?
Repair the first weapon.
Repair the second weapon.
Repair the armour.
Damn, I'm short of money. Talk about it later.
Now... in a blink of an eye it will be done...\nFinished with it, here you are!
Yeah... Marked One, you've been battered indeed...\nWell... I had some armour plates somewhere here... aha, here they are... Now, it goes this way... Uph... Here it is! Brand new, he-he.
Hm. Excellent work! Look, where did you learn that job? Keeping silent? Well, ok, I understand.
Work of a true master! Worth the money, that's for sure!
Can you fix another thing?
Let me see it.\n\nList of items to be repaired:
Barkeep, do you go in for repairing things, I wonder?

Not me myself, frankly speaking. But I've got a stalker clearing his debt to me by working - a real gunsmith. He's very good at fixing barrels and armour, too. I'll give him the job. What do you need to be repaired?
Repair the first weapon.
Repair the second weapon.
Repair the armour.
Man, I can't afford it right away. Maybe later.
Here, take it. All that could possibly be fixed, has been repaired.
Here, take it. All that could possibly be fixed, has been repaired.
Wow! Like new! Your gunsmith is really good! My best regards to him!
Excellent work, indeed!
Can he fix another item?
Sure he can, he hasn't got much work lately.
Showing.
Do you do repairs, by chance?
Yes, I divert my attention from research work for fixing a device or two. Unfortunately, I haven't got enough tools for that - it's only my hobby, you know - so the repairs will cost a pretty penny.
Repair the first weapon.
Repair the second weapon.
Repair the armour.
I'm sorry, I haven't got enough money at the moment. I'll drop by later.
Wait a moment...\nWell, I did my best. Here, take it.
It's quite difficult to obtain new armour plates at the moment, but I have some in stock. Wait here...\nHere... As best as I could...
You've done an excellent job! A great gunsmith you could become!
Your conscience is clear! The job has been done for an "A+"!
Could you fix something else, please?
Let's make it quick, while the data is still being processed.
Ok, what else I can do.
Excuse me, I'm here to repair my weaponry. How about your rates?

Ha-ha-ha... Don't worry, you won't have to sell your socks. I'm not the skinflint they suppose me to be. So, what do you want to be repaired? This isn't a cheap thing though, the more the wear is, the higher the price goes. So?
Repair the first weapon.
Repair the second weapon.
Repair the armour.
I'm short of money... Let's get back to it next time.
I've changed some parts, cleaned and oiled it...\nHave a pleasure using it!

Marked One, are you sure there is no "Shoot here!" mark on your back? Ok, give it here... I'll take a look...\nExclusively for you, brand new armour plates right from the latest supplies! And I've removed the "Shoot here!" mark too, ha-ha.
Good as new! Nice work!
Joker, dammit... Well... it's a pleasure to even look at it now!
Can you repair another thing?
Sure, but don't forget about the money. I'm not doing anything towards next year's payment.
Showing.
I would like to have my weaponry repaired... What about your rates?
Well, though you are the most tough stalker in the Zone, Strelok, I won't repair anything for free for you.
Repair the first weapon.
Repair the second weapon.
Repair the armour.
I don't have enough money now. Lets do it next time.
I've changed some parts, cleaned and oiled it... You are welcome!
I've fixed the armour. Here, take it.
Excellent work!
Excellent work!
Can you fix another thing?
Sure, just make sure you don't forget to pay.
Of course.
Listen, can you repair my stuff?
Of course, but it ain't free, you know.
Repair first gun.
Repair second gun.
Repair outfit.
I'm out of money... May be next time.
Replaced some spare parts, greased and cleaned... Here you go!
Reapired you outfti... Don't waste it!
Good work!
Excellent work!
Can you fix another one?
Of coutse, if you'll pay for it.
Got it.
